languages.text: "Ты видел эти записки безумца Фальта, Хронику Судеб? Это бред, граничащий с ересью".
"Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."
languages.original_text: "Ты видел эти записки безумца Фальта, Хронику Судеб? Это бред, граничащий с ересью".

traits.locale_text: "Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Destinies? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."
"Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Destinies? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."
"Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Destinies? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."
"Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Destinies? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."
"Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."
"Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."

languages.text: "Habt Ihr die Schriften dieses Wahnsinnigen Falt gesehen? Die Chroniken des Schicksals? Es ist Irrsinn, der schon an Ketzerei grenzt."
languages.original_text: "Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr die Schriften dieses Wahnsinnigen Falt gesehen? Die Chroniken des Schicksals? Es ist Irrsinn, der schon an Ketzerei grenzt."

languages.text: « Avez-vous lu les écrits de ce fou furieux de Falt, les Chroniques des destins ? Ces manuscrits sont empreints d'une démence qui frise l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous lu les écrits de ce fou furieux de Falt, les Chroniques des destins ? Ces manuscrits sont empreints d'une démence qui frise l'hérésie. »

languages.text: 「あの狂人ファルトが書いたものを見たか？『運命の記録』だったかな？あれは異端すれすれの狂気だ」
languages.original_text: "Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「あの狂人ファルトが書いたものを見たか？『運命の記録』だったかな？あれは異端すれすれの狂気だ」

languages.text: «¿Ha visto los escritos de ese lunático de Falt? ¿La Crónica de Destinos? Es un dislate que raya en la herejía».
languages.original_text: "Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha visto los escritos de ese lunático de Falt? ¿La Crónica de Destinos? Es un dislate que raya en la herejía».

languages.text: “你看过那个叫法尔特的疯子写的东西了吗？《命运编年史》？那些疯话几乎已经算得上是异端邪说了。”
languages.original_text: "Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."

traits.locale_text: “你看过那个叫法尔特的疯子写的东西了吗？《命运编年史》？那些疯话几乎已经算得上是异端邪说了。”

languages.text: "O Falt delisinin yazdığı Kaderlerin Vakayinamesi'ni gördün mü? Deliliği geçtim, kâfirlik sınırlarında geziyor."
languages.original_text: "Have you seen the writings of that madman, Falt? The Chronicle of Fates? It is lunacy bordering on heresy."

traits.locale_text: "O Falt delisinin yazdığı Kader Vakayinameleri'ni gördün mü? Deliliği geçtim, kâfirlik sınırlarında geziyor."
